titleStmt.title: The Protestant garland of joy and delight compos'd of nine pleasant new songs upon this late and prosperous change. Licensed according to order.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from Wing; place of publication conjectured by cataloger.
Additional title page on A2r lists contents.
Running title reads: The Protestant garland.
Cropped at foot with loss of some signatures; some print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
